scripts.build:v3: cd v3-fund-dashboard && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:monitoring: cd proactive-monitoring-center && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:asset: cd professional-asset-management-dashboard && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:advisor: cd my-advisor---premium-investment-console && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:all: npm run build && npm run build:v3 && npm run build:monitoring && npm run build:asset && npm run build:advisor && npm run copy:all
scripts.copy:all: mkdir -p dist/v3-fund-dashboard dist/proactive-monitoring-center dist/professional-asset-management-dashboard dist/my-advisor && cp -r v3-fund-dashboard/dist/* dist/v3-fund-dashboard/ && cp -r proactive-monitoring-center/dist/* dist/proactive-monitoring-center/ && cp -r professional-asset-management-dashboard/dist/* dist/professional-asset-management-dashboard/ && cp -r my-advisor---premium-investment-console/dist/* dist/my-advisor/
